__e: Then after we did our hitch, we both went our separate ways got married, raised kids.
And at the end of it all, we both realised that without a baby in the picture, the best thing to do was to say goodbye, stay friends, and just hope that our paths cross again, someday.
But I'd like to think that if our paths ever cross again, I'll be able to give you 20 dollars and you'll be able to dance for me, that wouldn't be akward.
But it's so dark. And like I said before, the road is very tricky.
Tell him the roads are the same for everyone.
People say it is cold, the streets are bad...
They make new roads, and they also make new cars, you know?
I want wheels on the road and eyes on the dirt.
Especially to make you drive all the way.
Been leading me, like a thread, throughout the world.
# The next time I sees the open road #
Well, here we are, out on the open road, retracing' the steps of my boyhood.
Ah, there's no one ever on these backcountry roads.
There're no roads, near or far
I mean, most of the our time will be spent driving anyways, so...
Both roads lead to Charleston, Captain, but we don't know if either are safe, so you want to just pick one?
"Two roads diverged in a yellow wood, and sorry I could not travel both..."
All roads lead to Fitz, which means everything has to be about him, not you.
